project: CI/CD Pipeline for Supabase Ruby SDK
description: Set up a GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline for the supabase-rb monorepo. The pipeline will run tests and linting on every push and pull request across multiple Ruby versions, and provide a release workflow for building gems and creating GitHub releases (manual gem publishing to RubyGems).

userStories.title: Core CI Workflow - Run Tests on Push/PR
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tests to run automatically on every push and pull request so that I can catch regressions early.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `.github/workflows/ci.yml` workflow file
Workflow triggers on push to `main` and on pull requests targeting `main`
Installs dependencies via `bundle install`
Runs `bundle exec rake spec` to execute all 6 gems' test suites
Workflow fails if any test fails
Uses `actions/checkout`, `ruby/setup-ruby` actions

userStories.title: Ruby Version Matrix
userStories.description: As a developer, I want CI to test against Ruby 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, and 3.4 so that I can ensure compatibility with all supported versions.
acceptanceCriteria: CI workflow uses a matrix strategy with Ruby versions: 3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4
All matrix jobs must pass for the workflow to succeed
Matrix is defined in a maintainable way (easy to add/remove versions)

userStories.title: Rubocop Linting in CI
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Rubocop to run in CI so that code style is enforced consistently across all contributions.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a lint job to the CI workflow (runs in parallel with tests)
Runs `bundle exec rubocop` against the codebase
Workflow fails if any Rubocop offense is found
Lint job runs on a single Ruby version (latest stable) to avoid redundancy

userStories.title: Release Workflow - Build Gems and Create GitHub Release
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a release workflow that builds all gem packages and creates a GitHub release when a version tag is pushed, so that release artifacts are available without automated RubyGems publishing.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `.github/workflows/release.yml` workflow file
Workflow triggers on push of version tags matching `v*` pattern (e.g., `v0.2.0`)
Builds `.gem` files for all 6 gems using `gem build`
Creates a GitHub release with the tag name as title
Attaches all built `.gem` files as release assets
Includes auto-generated changelog in the release body

userStories.title: Dependabot Configuration
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want Dependabot configured so that dependency updates are proposed automatically via pull requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Create `.github/dependabot.yml` configuration file
Monitors Bundler (Ruby) dependencies for each gem in `gems/` directory
Monitors GitHub Actions versions in `.github/workflows/`
Configured with weekly update schedule
Groups minor/patch updates to reduce PR noise
